JUnitPerf 1.5 is now available with the following change:

- Added the TestFactory class to allow stateful test cases to be
decorated as LoadTest instances. Use of a TestFactory ensures that each
LoadTest thread uses its own thread-local decorated test instance.


The JUnitPerf documentation is available at

       http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html

JUnitPerf 1.5 can be downloaded directly from

       http://www.clarkware.com/software/junitperf1.5.zip


Many thanks to Ervin Varga for contributing this feature to JUnitPerf!

Any feedback you may have is most welcome and appreciated.

Thanks and enjoy!

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
